name: Panic Shopper!
description:
The store is closing any minute, and you really need to do that last minute shopping.

Don't panic! Keep it cool, and find all the items on the shopping list.

  • Move your cart with the "w, a ,s d". 
  • Pick up items by clicking and holding left mouse button. To move the item move the mouse. To push it towards or away from you use the mouse scroll wheel.
  • To open freezers press left left button.
  • Put the groceries on the checkout counter belt to register them and then pay by activating the card reader with left mouse click.

Have fun!
